metadata.title: CVE-2023-36617 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A ReDoS issue was discovered in the URI component before 0.12.2 for Ruby.The URI parser mishandles invalid URLs that have specific characters. Thereis an increase in execution time for parsing strings to URI objects withrfc2396_parser.rb and rfc3986_parser.rb. NOTE: this issue exists becuse ofan incomplete fix for CVE-2023-28755. Version 0.10.3 is also a fixedversion.

criterions.comment: ruby2.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
jruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
